childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Thanks for visiting my online portfolio!

Brief summary about me:

- Computer Science '16 undergrad from NIT, Allahabad. (CGPA of 8.3/10)

- Around 4 years of extensive experience both into back-end systems(mostly into Java) and front-end frameworks(AngularJS and ReactJS). 

- Believe in very methodical approach of software development, which includes delivering solutions in a timely, extensible, maintainable, readable and most importantly reliable manner.

- Have extensive experience working in testing frameworks like Cypress, Jest and JUnit.

- Prefer working on projects that make a direct impact to the end user. Solving real-world problems that people face today in IT industry intrigues me the most.
